item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Fine-Tuning LLMs: A Review of Technologies, Research, Best Practices, Challenges (68 points | 5 comments)
2. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (344 points | 178 comments)
3. First images from Euclid are in (481 points | 147 comments)
4. LTESniffer: An Open-Source LTE Downlink/Uplink Eavesdropper (135 points | 10 comments)
5. Firefox-Passwords-Decryptor: Extracts and decrypts passwords saved in Firefox (41 points | 15 comments)
6. A Controversial Rare-Book Dealer Tries to Rewrite His Own Ending (29 points | 5 comments)
7. Cosine (YC W23) Hiring JavaScript/TS Dev to Build AI SWE ( | hide)
8. Tesla delays Cybertruck's range extender, reduces its range (18 points | 3 comments)
9. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (257 points | 94 comments)
10. Civet: A Superset of TypeScript (120 points | 95 comments)
11. Show HN: Data Formulator – AI-powered data visualization from Microsoft Research (101 points | 7 comments)
12. Building a Game with the Real Engine (48 points | 11 comments)
13. Writing a Mathematica Interpreter in Typescript (22 points | 2 comments)
14. How should the new element work? (27 points | 8 comments)
15. The Multics Maclisp Compiler: The Basic Hackery – A Tutorial (1977) (8 points | discuss)
16. Paranormasight: A Game Exploring the Depths of Honjo in Tokyo (28 points | 2 comments)
17. Apple's AirPods Pro hearing health features (154 points | 77 comments)
18. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (143 points | 65 comments)
19. Scalene: A high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, memory profiler for Python (105 points | 7 comments)
20. Learning to Learn (82 points | 41 comments)
21. Mind Wandering: More than a Bad Habit (2018) [pdf] (75 points | 23 comments)
22. Transformers Utilization in Chart Understanding: A Review of Advances and Future (22 points | 2 comments)
23. Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths (64 points | 26 comments)
24. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (54 points | 13 comments)
25. Vimium – The Hacker's Browser (34 points | 22 comments)
26. Thought experiments that fray the fabric of space-time (94 points | 99 comments)
27. Brazil Arrests 'USDoD' Hacker in FBI Infragard Breach (8 points | discuss)
28. Study offers clues into when and why mosquitoes bite (41 points | 29 comments)
29. Show HN: Floating point arithmetic types in C++ for any size and any base (73 points | 30 comments)
30. A near impossible literacy test Louisiana used to suppress the black vote (102 points | 111 comments)
